mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order_shipping(orderId, receiverName, receiverPhone, receiverMobile, receiverState , receiverCity, receiverDistrict, receiverAddress, receiverZip, created, updated) VALUE (#{orderid},#{receivername},#{receiverphone},#{receivermobile},#{receiverstate},#{receivercity} ,#{receiverdistrict},#{receiveraddress},#{receiverzip},#{created},#{updated})
